name: Construction City 2019: Building Simulator
description:
Get ready for new Construction City 2019: Building Simulator Game for getting the unique experience of house building construction. This building city game is very challenging in all city construction and road construction games. Use ultimate construction machines such as dumper trucks, heavy excavator crane, heavy tower crane, road roller and other heavy construction machinery for building house perfectly like real house building games. You’ve played different construction simulator and bridge construction games but this house builder game has much better experience. Try your best to perform your construction work in building city simulator game like house construction simulation games.

In Construction City 2019: Building Simulator Game you can enjoy house building for free. Transport building material from one place to construction site by driving construction machines like heavy cranes and loader trucks. Load trucks with construction material by using heavy machinery such as excavator crane other heavy vehicles. Enjoy the fun of this outstanding Construction Simulation Game. Use loader truck for moving construction craft to construction site. Drive construction vehicles such as excavator crane and cement trucks.

Construction City 2019: Building Simulator Game Features:
* High quality 3D material graphics for house building 
* Multiple construction tasks 
* Realistic controls of construction machines
* 12 house building levels
* Different locations to explore city construction
* Smooth and realistic physics for heavy cranes, trucks and other construction machinery
* Free ride mode for driving heavy machines 
* Realistic construction site environment

Use the heavy machines to place the construction material to its correct place. Build your dream houses and act as a real state builder. Construction simulation games give ideas how to do construction work in house building? Explore the techniques of foundation construction, grouting, wall construction and roof management in this house building game. Control heavy construction machines to the best flexibility of making your dream houses.
